DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent 2 . Target population : Healthy subject determine medical history , surgical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory determination . 3 . Subjects body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive 4 . Men , woman nonchildbearing potential . Women must document proof childbearing potential breast feed 5 . Any significant acute chronic medical illness , include hepatic disease , condition list contraindication diltiazem itraconazole package insert . 2 . Evidence coagulopathy , prolong unexplained clinically significant bleeding , frequent unexplained bruising thrombus formation . 3 . History chronic constipation , GI disease , arrhythmia , sinus bradycardia , significant head injury , dizziness headache , hemophilia , Rosenthal syndrome , FX1a deficiency coagulopathies , systemic lupus erythematosus . 4 .
